content: **crocheted and felted trivet in drops snow the piece is worked from the middle outwards and with bobbles theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-712 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** after felting approx 26 cm in diameter before felting approx 34 cm in diameter **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 150 g colour 08 crimson red 50 g colour 46 medium grey if you work a trivet in one colour you need approx 160 g drops snow **crochet gauge** 8 treble crochets in width and 4 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm when 2 rounds of bobbles have been worked the piece measures approx 14 cm in diameter crochet hook drops crochet hook size 9 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
